channel.title: Help/Setup VPS
channel.description:
Hello , My name is Hyperion i have been trying to setup my VPS: Softsys Hosting - Windows VPS
I have been looking up for guides how to setup a vps , and they have told me that i had to open port 3389 TCP and add the port to firewall and allow remote desktop and allow it on firewall , i have done all of those steps but i CANT find out why its not connect i get the standard three options why it cant be connected Please Help !!!!
Help me trough skype is the best way to contact : Beast.pk
:palm:

item.title: Help/Setup VPS

Hello , My name is Hyperion
i have been trying to setup my VPS: Softsys Hosting - Windows VPS

I have been looking up for guides how to setup a vps , and they have told me that i had to open port 3389 TCP
and add the port to firewall and allow remote desktop and allow it on firewall , i have done all of those steps but i CANT find out why its not connect
i get the standard three options why it cant be connected Please Help !!!
